code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import"../styles/Admin.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Admin=()=>{const[report,setReport]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{fetch("http://127.0.0.1:5000/admin/report").then(res=>res.json()).then(data=>setReport(data.aggregated||[])).catch(error=>console.error("Error fetching report:",error));},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"admin-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Admin Report"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{className:"admin-table",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Video Pair"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Video 1 Votes"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Video 2 Votes"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Total Votes"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:Object.keys(report).map(key=>{const pair=report[key];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:`${pair.video1_id} vs ${pair.video2_id}`}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:pair.video1_votes}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:pair.video2_votes}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:pair.total_votes})]},key);})})]})]});};export default Admin;
